txt.en: 'I thank you, [placeholder]. It is good to see some of the Trév Gállorg and Trév Duvárdain working as one.\n\n'Now, if you would give a blood-root to Lúkhag before setting the remaining in a chest. I see Lúkhag eying what you have picked!'
Eiricháv can be found in north west Câr Bronach.\n\nYou should talk to Aighrig at Eiricháv.
Blood-root can be found in north west Câr Bronach. Clavanail can be found just west of Eiricháv.\n\nYou should collect blood-root and feed the carrion-crows for Aighrig.
Add feed to the feed buckets ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Eiricháv can be found in north west Câr Bronach.\n\nYou should give one blood-root to Lúkhag.
Eiricháv can be found in north west Câr Bronach.\n\nYou should place the rest of the blood-root in a supply chest.
Aighrig of the Trév Dúvardain seeks assistance with tasks at Eiricháv.
Added feed to the feed buckets ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Place the rest of the blood-root in a supply chest
You feed Lúkhag a blood-root. Lúkhag looks as grateful as a bat ought to look after being fed, you suppose.

'Greetings again, [placeholder]. The paths cross once more.

'Lúkhag and I have done all that we could, training the bats of Grytholm to live on their own, and no longer under control of the Angmarim. I then came to Câr Bronach when I received news that more bats were being trained in northern caverns. When I got there, the caves were empty.

'Now, I am assisting a cause that aligns with my own. It is currently a bit of a respite as I was about to feed our rescued crows and pick some blood-root. Would you care to assist me?'
